channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Posts List Designer by Category
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Posts List Designer by Category

item.title: CVE-2022-4749|2024-08-03T01:48:40.195Z -- unknown -- posts%20list%20designer%20by%20category
item.description: The Posts List Designer by Category WordPress plugin before 3.2 does not validate and escape some of its shortcode attributes before outputting them back in the page, which could allow users with a role as low as contributor to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks which could be used against high privilege users such as admins.
